page-not-found.description: Something went wrong. Unable to load templates at the moment.

empty-state.title: No templates found
empty-state.description: We couldn't find any templates matching your search criteria.

unfulfilled-order-alert.title: Delayed reminder of unfulfilled orders
unfulfilled-order-alert.description: Send a reminder about unfulfilled orders to the store owner email 2 days after the order is completed.

high-risk-order-alert.title: High risk order alert
high-risk-order-alert.description: Use this template if you want to inform about the high risk order.

low-product-quantity-alert.title: Product quantity alert
low-product-quantity-alert.description: Send a message with an alert about a small number of goods to the store owner's email.

accept-marketing-tag.title: Marketing tags
accept-marketing-tag.description: Use this template if you want to assign tags for users who agree to get marketing.

archive-free-orders-on-fulfillment.title: Archive free orders on fulfillment
archive-free-orders-on-fulfillment.description: Archive orders with zero total when them fulfilled.

block-list.title: Block list by mail or id
block-list.description: Use this template if you want to create a block list of customers by mail or user id.

low-risk-capture-payment.title: Low-risk orders auto payment capture
low-risk-capture-payment.description: Use this template if you want to set auto payment capture for low-risk orders.

review-request.title: Delayed request for a review
review-request.description: Send a request for a review to users with a completed order in a week.

tag-foreign-currency-code.title: Tags for foreign currencies
tag-foreign-currency-code.description: Use this template if you want to assign tags for users with foreign currencies.

thank-you-order-email.title: Thank you message
thank-you-order-email.description: Send a thank you message for ordering by mail.

tag-vip-customer.title: Tag VIP Customers
tag-vip-customer.description: Assign a special VIP tag to customers who make the biggest number of orders.

order-line-items-includes-tags.title: Tag the order by purchased products tags
order-line-items-includes-tags.description: Add the tag to the order when a purchased product has some tags.

tag-order-by-purchased-products-titles.title: Tag the order by purchased products titles
tag-order-by-purchased-products-titles.description: Create tags from products display names (titles) and add this tags to the order.

send-sales-report-every-day.title: Report on sales of goods and orders
send-sales-report-every-day.description: A sales and order report message will be sent once a day.

reminder-of-unpaid-orders.title: Sending a reminder of unpaid orders to users
reminder-of-unpaid-orders.description: Send a reminder of payment for the order if it has not been paid for several days.

notificate-customers-about-new-products.title: New products notification
notificate-customers-about-new-products.description: Send a notification to the user about new products in the store after ordering.

email-vendor.title: Supplier notification
email-vendor.description: This message will be sent to product suppliers if their product is ordered.

email-reminder-for-low-stock-products.title: Low stock items report
email-reminder-for-low-stock-products.description: Send every day report with low stock items.

hide-out-of-stock-products.title: Hide out of stock products
hide-out-of-stock-products.description: Hide products whose quantity is less than or equal to zero.

back-in-stock-available-products.title: Back in stock available products
back-in-stock-available-products.description: Back in stock products whose quantity is greater than zero.

hot-products.title: Tag HOT products
hot-products.description: Marks products that have been purchased with the "HOT" tag, if the product is not ordered within 24 hours after that, the tag will be removed.

send-email-for-first-product-purchase.title: Send email for first product purchase
send-email-for-first-product-purchase.description: Send email when some customer ordered some product for the first time.

tag-new-products.title: Tag new products
tag-new-products.description: Marks products that have been added to the store with the "NEW" tag, then on 30 days after that, the tag will be removed.

hold-fulfillment-for-orders-awaiting-pay.title: Hold fulfilments for orders awaiting payments
hold-fulfillment-for-orders-awaiting-pay.description: Use this template if you need to pause orders that are waiting for payment.

unpaid-order-reminder.title: Unpaid order reminder
unpaid-order-reminder.description: Remind the customer about his order that was not paid within 24 hours.

invoice-email-for-unpaid-orders.title: Invoice email for unpaid orders
invoice-email-for-unpaid-orders.description: Send order invoice for  unpaid orders.

copy-purchased-product-tags-to-customer.title: Copy purchased product tags to the customer
copy-purchased-product-tags-to-customer.description: Copy tags of the purchased product to the customer.

send-customer-activation-link.title: Send customer activation link
send-customer-activation-link.description: Send activation link to the customer email if account not activated.

tag-vip-customers-by-monthly-spent.title: Tag VIP customers by monthly spent
tag-vip-customers-by-monthly-spent.description: Assign tags to VIP customers based on monthly expenses.

coupon-for-newsletter-subscriber.title: Coupon for newsletter subscriber
coupon-for-newsletter-subscriber.description: Send a discount code to the customer's email that subscribed to SMS marketing.

recover-abandoned-checkouts.title: Recover abandoned checkouts
recover-abandoned-checkouts.description: Send a reminder and discount code to the customer email if customer left the checkout page.

send-coupon-to-customer-after-first-orde.title: Coupon after first order
send-coupon-to-customer-after-first-orde.description: Send a discount code to the email of the customer who placed their first order.

add-order-note-if-certain-customer-tag.title: Add an order note for customers with a specific tag
add-order-note-if-certain-customer-tag.description: Append order note if the customer has a certain tag.

coupon-for-next-orders.title: Coupon for next orders
coupon-for-next-orders.description: Send a discount code for future orders based on the order amount.

unpublish-products-have-been-out-of-stoc.title: Unpublish out-of-stock products after 3 days
unpublish-products-have-been-out-of-stoc.description: Hide a product if it's out of stock within 3 days.

add-order-tag-for-returning-customers.title: Add an order tag for returning customers
add-order-tag-for-returning-customers.description: Add tag 'Returned customer' to the order when customer makes order after 90 days from his previous order.

copy-notes-from-customers-to-their-order.title: Copy customer notes to their orders
copy-notes-from-customers-to-their-order.description: Copy notes about customers into their orders if they existed when the order was created.

tag-new-customers.title: Tag new customers
tag-new-customers.description: Add "New customer" tag when the customer is created.

untag-orders-when-fully-paid.title: Untag orders when fully paid
untag-orders-when-fully-paid.description: Remove the "Unpaid order" tag from order when it is fully paid.

untag-orders-when-paid.title: Untag orders when paid
untag-orders-when-paid.description: Remove the "Unpaid order" tag from order when it is paid.

add-default-custom-attributes-to-new-ord.title: Add default custom attributes to new orders
add-default-custom-attributes-to-new-ord.description: Add custom attributes to the order when it created.

add-note-for-new-orders-having-certain-t.title: Add a note to new orders with a specific tag
add-note-for-new-orders-having-certain-t.description: Add a record to the order notes if an order has a certain tag when it is created.

copy-order-notes-to-customers-note.title: Copy order notes to customer note
copy-order-notes-to-customers-note.description: When order is created copy order notes to customer notes.

tag-cancelled-orders.title: Tag cancelled orders
tag-cancelled-orders.description: Add and remove tags when order is cancelled.

tag-orders-by-discount-code.title: Tag orders by discount code
tag-orders-by-discount-code.description: Add tag with discount code to the order.

untag-customers-when-certain-product-is-.title: Untag customers when a certain product is refunded
untag-customers-when-certain-product-is-.description: Remove the tag from customer if a product with a certain title is refunded.

archive-orders-when-fulfilled.title: Archive orders when fulfilled
archive-orders-when-fulfilled.description: Archive orders when they are fully fulfilled.

capture-order-payment-after-7-days.title: Capture order payment after a week

pay-orders-from-customers-with-certain-t.title: Mark as paid for customers with a specific tag
pay-orders-from-customers-with-certain-t.description: Mark an order as paid by a customer with a specific tag and remove the tag from a customer when the order is created.

auto-publish-new-products.title: Auto publish new products
auto-publish-new-products.description: Publish a new product if it is active and not yet published.

tag-customers-first-order.title: Tag the customer's first order
tag-customers-first-order.description: Assign a tag to the first order made by the customer.

auto-tag-orders-when-paid.title: Auto-tag orders when paid
auto-tag-orders-when-paid.description: Assign a tag to the newly-paid order.

increase-customer-credit-by-the-order-am.title: Increase customer credit by the order amount
increase-customer-credit-by-the-order-am.description: When return approved, increases customer credit on a value of returned products price.

decrease-customer-credit-by-the-order-am.title: Decrease customer credit by the order amount
decrease-customer-credit-by-the-order-am.description: When order created, decreases customer credit on an order value.

get-notified-on-slack-when-a-customer-re.title: Get notified on Slack when a customer requests a return
get-notified-on-slack-when-a-customer-re.description: Receive a customizable slack notification when a customer submits a return request from their account.

release-exchange-items-once-the-return-i.title: Release exchange items once the return is closed
release-exchange-items-once-the-return-i.description: When a return is closed, check if there is an outstanding balance on the order. If there is no order balance, release the exchange items.

cancel-inactive-returns.title: Cancel inactive returns
cancel-inactive-returns.description: Automatically cancel a return that has not been refunded or restocked within a certain period of time.

issue-store-credit-customer-percentage-o.title: Issue store credit to a customer a percentage of the order amount
issue-store-credit-customer-percentage-o.description: Implement a loyalty program and issue some percent of an order amount as customer credits.

issue-customer-credits-when-goods-return.title: Issue customer credits when a goods return is completed
issue-customer-credits-when-goods-return.description: You can issue store credits instead of refunds during returns to save an order income and trigger customers for the next purchase on your store.

post-purchase.title: Coupon after first Post-purchase order
post-purchase.description: Send a discount code to the customer after their first post-purchase order is completed.

tag-product-when-variant-stock-is-low-at.title: Tag product when variant stock is low at specified location
tag-product-when-variant-stock-is-low-at.description: Tags a product when variant stock drops below a set level at a chosen location.

tag-customer-by-spend-across-recent-orde.title: Tag customer by spend across the last 20 orders
tag-customer-by-spend-across-recent-orde.description: Tags a customer based on how much they’ve spent across their recent orders.

tag-all-customers-with-high-total-spend.title: Add tag to all customers with high total spend
tag-all-customers-with-high-total-spend.description: This workflow adds a tag to all customers whose total spend exceeds a certain threshold.

move-the-new-product-to-a-dedicated-ship.title: Move the new product to a dedicated shipping profile
move-the-new-product-to-a-dedicated-ship.description: When a product is added to the store, remove its variants from the selected shipping profile and then add those variants to another chosen shipping profile.

set-observe-data-for-orders.title: Initialize observed fields for orders
set-observe-data-for-orders.description: Initializes fields of existing orders so future changes trigger the workflow correctly.

set-observe-data-for-products.title: Initialize observed fields for products
set-observe-data-for-products.description: Initializes fields of existing products so future changes trigger the workflow correctly.

auto-tag-new-orders.title: Auto-tag new orders
auto-tag-new-orders.description: Tags an order immediately after it’s created.

ask-review-after-fulfillment.title: Ask for reviews a week after order fulfillment
ask-review-after-fulfillment.description: After 7 days upon order fulfilled, send email that gives the customer direct links to their purchases on your website, where they can leave a review using your existing review system.

tag-customers-after-order-paid.title: Tag customers when their order is paid
tag-customers-after-order-paid.description: Tags a customer after their order is paid.

tag-customers-by-discount-code.title: Tag customers based on discount codes used
tag-customers-by-discount-code.description: Tags a customer based on discount codes used in their orders.

tag-customers-based-on-email.title: Tag customers based on email domain
tag-customers-based-on-email.description: Tags a customer based on email domain, helping you target specific organizations or email groups.

tag-orders-by-risk-level.title: Tag orders by their risk level
tag-orders-by-risk-level.description: This workflow adds a tag to incoming orders, based on the risk level determined for the order.

capture-order-payment-based-on-shipping.title: Auto-capture order payment based on shipping method
capture-order-payment-based-on-shipping.description: Automatically captures order payment based on the selected shipping method to speed up fulfillment for priority shipments.

apply-a-percentage-off-shipping-discount.title: Apply a percentage-off shipping discount
apply-a-percentage-off-shipping-discount.description: Apply percentage-based discounts to the cheapest shipping option using tiers, where discount rates increase as the cart subtotal increases. Merchants configure the discount percentages and cart subtotal thresholds.

create-a-tiered-discount-based-on-line-s.title: Create a tiered discount based on line subtotals
create-a-tiered-discount-based-on-line-s.description: Apply fixed amount discounts that increase with cart line subtotals: $10 off for lines totaling $100+, $20 off for lines totaling $200+, and $30 off for lines totaling $300+.

create-a-dynamic-discount-from-discount-.title: Create a dynamic discount from discount codes
create-a-dynamic-discount-from-discount-.description: Identify discount codes that are written in the format X%OFF (such as 10%OFF or 25%OFF), and apply the discount to either orders or shipping when customers enter the code.

apply-a-collection-based-order-discount.title: Apply a collection-based order discount
apply-a-collection-based-order-discount.description: Apply a percentage discount when the cart contains products from a specific collection and meets a minimum order value.

apply-a-discount-to-custom-products.title: Apply a discount to custom products
apply-a-discount-to-custom-products.description: Give a 20% discount to products with the isCustom metafield set to true. Shows how to check metafield values, filter eligible products, and apply percentage discounts with the ProductDiscountSelectionStrategy.All selection strategy.

apply-a-discount-to-orders-with-no-sale-.title: Apply a discount to orders with no sale items
apply-a-discount-to-orders-with-no-sale-.description: Provide a percentage discount on orders that contains compare-at prices. The discount percentage is configurable through an app-owned metafield and applies to the entire order subtotal.

apply-tiered-discounts-based-on-order-su.title: Apply tiered discounts based on order subtotal
apply-tiered-discounts-based-on-order-su.description: Provide percentage discounts at different spending thresholds (for example, 10% off at $100, 20% off at $200). The tier configuration is stored in an app-owned metafield, and the function automatically applies the highest eligible discount.

apply-a-fixed-discount-for-collection-sp.title: Apply a fixed discount for collection-specific purchases
apply-a-fixed-discount-for-collection-sp.description: Apply a fixed $50 discount when the cart subtotal exceeds $100 and contains products from a specific collection. Both conditions must be met for the discount to apply.

apply-a-discount-to-orders-containing-on.title: Apply a discount to orders containing only new collection items
apply-a-discount-to-orders-containing-on.description: Apply a 10% discount to the entire order when all products in the cart have a specific tag. The discount is only applied when every item meets this condition.

apply-a-percentage-discount-to-specific-.title: Apply a percentage discount to specific products
apply-a-percentage-discount-to-specific-.description: Apply a configurable percentage discount to specific products identified by their IDs. Both the discount percentage and target product list are stored in an app-owned metafield.

apply-a-discount-to-the-first-delivery-g.title: Apply a discount to the first delivery group
apply-a-discount-to-the-first-delivery-g.description: Apply an automatic discount that gives 100% off the first delivery group.

apply-a-per-item-discount-to-a-product-w.title: Apply a per-item discount to a product with quantity limits
apply-a-per-item-discount-to-a-product-w.description: Apply a fixed amount discount per item to a specific product, limited to a maximum quantity (for example, $5 off each unit, up to 2 units). The discount amount, product ID, and quantity limit are stored in an app-owned metafield.

apply-a-percentage-discount-to-products-.title: Apply a percentage discount to products with specific SKUs
apply-a-percentage-discount-to-products-.description: Apply a percentage discount to cart items that match specific SKUs from a configurable list (for example, 20% off items with SKUs 'SKU123' or 'SKU456'). Both the target SKUs and discount percentage are stored in an app-owned metafield.

apply-an-extra-discount-to-sale-items.title: Apply an extra discount to sale items
apply-an-extra-discount-to-sale-items.description: Apply an additional percentage discount to products already on sale. For example, take an extra 20% off sale items. The discount percentage is stored in an app-owned metafield.

apply-a-percentage-discount-for-vip-cust.title: Apply a percentage discount for VIP customers
apply-a-percentage-discount-for-vip-cust.description: Apply a percentage discount on all cart items for customers with the VIP tag (for example, 20% off for VIP members). The discount percentage is stored in an app-owned metafield.

apply-tiered-shipping-discounts-based-on.title: Apply tiered shipping discounts based on cart subtotal
apply-tiered-shipping-discounts-based-on.description: Apply a percentage discount to the cheapest delivery method in each delivery group. The discount percentage increases at configurable cart subtotal thresholds (for example, 10% off shipping at $50, 15% off at $100). The tier configuration is stored in an app-owned metafield.

apply-a-shipping-discount-based-on-locat.title: Apply a shipping discount based on location
apply-a-shipping-discount-based-on-locat.description: Apply a 50% discount to express shipping when the delivery address is in Ottawa. The function checks the customer's location and applies the discount only to the express shipping option.

apply-tiered-shipping-discounts-for-loya.title: Apply tiered shipping discounts for loyal customers buying from a collection
apply-tiered-shipping-discounts-for-loya.description: Apply shipping discounts to customers tagged as member who purchase three or more items from a specific collection. Shipping options under $5 become free, while options over $5 receive a $5 fixed discount. Combines customer loyalty and collection-based conditions.

create-a-buy-x-get-y-discount.title: Create a Buy X get Y discount
create-a-buy-x-get-y-discount.description: Apply a 10% discount to one product when another specified product is in the cart. The discount applies to only one item. Also offers free shipping when both products are purchased together.

create-loyalty-program-discounts.title: Create loyalty program discounts
create-loyalty-program-discounts.description: Provide three types of discounts for customers with loyalty tags: $10 off the last cart item, 10% off the entire order, and free shipping on all delivery options.

create-an-order-discount-with-exclusions.title: Create an order discount with exclusions
create-an-order-discount-with-exclusions.description: Apply a 10% discount to the order while excluding the first cart item, plus a 20% discount on the highest-value item in the cart. This approach enables creating "second item discount" promotions or selective discounting where certain high-value or non-discountable items remain at full price while the rest of the order receives the discount.

create-combined-multi-type-discounts.title: Create combined multi-type discounts
create-combined-multi-type-discounts.description: Apply three discount types in one Function: 10% off the entire order, 20% off the most expensive item in the cart, and free shipping on all deliveries.

create-a-configurable-discount-with-meta.title: Create a configurable discount with metafields
create-a-configurable-discount-with-meta.description: Read configured metafields to provide merchant-configurable discounts: product discounts for specific collections, order-wide percentage discounts, and shipping discounts.

create-a-free-shipping-discount-with-cur.title: Create a free shipping discount with currency thresholds
create-a-free-shipping-discount-with-cur.description: Apply free shipping when cart subtotal exceeds thresholds configured in shop metafields for different currencies (for example, $100 USD, €80 EUR). The Function automatically detects the cart's currency and applies the appropriate threshold.
